channel.title: RadioLeMans.com
channel.itunes:author: Radio Show Ltd.
channel.itunes:summary: Podcasts from RadioLeMans.com, including coverage of races from the FIA World Endurance Championship (WEC), European Le Mans Series (ELMS) and of course the Le Mans 24 hours. Plus other great endurance racing from around the world: The Nuerburgring 24 hours, Bathurst 12 hours, Daytona 24 hours, Dubai 12 hours, 360 Motor Club and many many more. In addition there's the weekly motorsport magazine show Midweek Motorsport, in depth interviews with motor racing's biggest names, and behind the scenes looks at teams and manufacturers.
channel.itunes:keywords: radiolemans, radio le mans, hindhaugh, midweek motorsport, bathurst, dubai, nick daman, american le mans series, european le mans series, nurburgring, le mans, ALMS, sportscar, Formula 1, Motor Racing, Motor Sport, Formula One, Racing, NASCAR, Indycar
